mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.seckill_price, b.price as originalPrice, a.seckill_price, b.name, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM seckill_goods a LEFT JOIN goods b ON a.goodId = b.id;

SELECT a.id, a.seckill_price, b.price as originalPrice, a.seckill_price, b.img, a.inventory, b.name, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM seckill_goods a LEFT JOIN goods b ON a.goodId = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
